name: Traidcraft
goal:
Traidcraft is a leading Fairtrade company specialising in making trade work for the poor. In collaboration with local partners we work to create opportunities for poor people to harness the benefits of trade, helping them to develop sustainable livelihoods.

We use this experience to inform our advocacy and campaigning work on trade justice and corporate accountability.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU trade policies, trade and investment agreements including TTIP, TISA and economic partnership agreements, private sector practice and regulation. Competition policy, unfair trading practices in the supply chain, business and human rights, non financial reporting.
